CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page A24, reads: "Married At Fair - While their attendants look on, Mr. and Mrs. Matthew Brown accept a Bible from Maurice Contay, following their wedding at The Courier Home Service Fair, which was held at Syria Mosque. The bride is the former Catherine Hodge.  Left to right: Miss Dolores Wilkinson, the bride, Mr. Contay, the groom, and his brother, James Brown. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of bridal party, from left, Dolores Wilkinson, bride Catherine Hodge Brown, groom Matthew Brown, and James Brown, posed on platform in front of demonstration kitchen in Syria Mosque during the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
